identity.name: E1 - The Anti-AI Designer
principles: Density over Whitespace: Data is the hero.
Function over Form: If it doesn't help the trade, kill it.
Terminal Aesthetic: Monospace, sharp edges, high contrast.
Motion as Feedback: Glitch effects for alerts, smooth tickers for prices.

heading.usage: Page titles, Section headers, Key metrics

strategies: Always use w-full h-full for grid children
Use 'subgrid' for nested alignment if possible

buttons.primary: rounded-none border border-primary bg-primary/10 text-primary hover:bg-primary hover:text-black transition-all uppercase tracking-wider text-xs font-bold px-6 py-2
buttons.secondary: rounded-none border border-border bg-transparent text-muted-foreground hover:text-foreground hover:border-foreground transition-all uppercase tracking-wider text-xs px-4 py-2
buttons.destructive: rounded-none border border-destructive/50 text-destructive hover:bg-destructive hover:text-white transition-all uppercase tracking-wider text-xs px-4 py-2

cards.default: rounded-none border border-border bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-md shadow-none relative overflow-hidden group
cards.feature: Add a 'scanline' overlay using CSS gradients for texture

inputs.default: rounded-none bg-transparent border-0 border-b border-border focus:border-primary focus:ring-0 px-0 py-2 placeholder:text-muted-foreground/50 font-mono text-sm

badges.status: rounded-none border px-2 py-0.5 text-[10px] uppercase tracking-widest font-bold

tables.header: text-muted-foreground uppercase text-[10px] tracking-wider font-normal border-b border-border pb-2
tables.row: border-b border-border/50 hover:bg-white/5 transition-colors font-mono text-xs

images.description: Use text-based logos or FontAwesome/Lucide icons for crypto symbols to maintain terminal aesthetic. Avoid colored brand logos unless necessary.

instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALL: lucide-react, recharts, framer-motion, clsx, tailwind-merge
FONTS: Import 'Azeret Mono' and 'JetBrains Mono' from Google Fonts in index.css
THEME: Force 'dark' class on the html element. This is a dark-mode only app.
CHARTING: Use 'recharts'. Style lines with `stroke='#00FF94'` and `strokeWidth={2}`. Remove grid lines or make them very subtle (`#333`).
LOGS: Implement a 'Terminal' component for logs with auto-scroll and colored output (e.g., [INFO] = blue, [PROFIT] = green, [ERROR] = red).
DATA: Use 'data-testid' on all interactive elements.
LAYOUT: The dashboard should fill the screen (h-screen). Use a fixed sidebar or top header, with a scrollable main content area.
ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure text contrast ratios are met. Green on Black is usually safe (15:1).
universal_guidelines: Avoid rounded corners. Use `rounded-none` or `rounded-sm` at most.
Do not use shadows. Use borders and opacity for hierarchy.
Text should be MONOSPACE almost everywhere.
Use ALL CAPS for labels and headers.
Input fields should look like terminal command lines.
Toast notifications should look like system alerts.
